alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 10 at 2:40AM PST until February 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 60 mph. For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 93. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Heat Advisory, until 6 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, and stay out of the sun. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
